text: "Friday I'm in Love" is a song by the English gothic rock band The Cure. It was released on 15 May, 1992 from their ninth album Wish. It went to number six in the United Kingdom and number 18 in the United States. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1992 songs Category:The Cure songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Jangle pop songs Category:Indie pop songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Friday I'm in Love
